All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AccessMethod
This class is used to change the screen.
AddAppointmentController
This class is the controller for the Add Appointment screen.
AddCustomerController
This class is the controller for the "Add Customer" screen.
AppointmentDB
This abstract class represents a base class for managing appointments in a database.
Appointments
The Appointments class represents an appointment with various properties such as ID, title, description, location, type, start and end times, customer ID, user ID, and contact ID.
ContactDB
This class provides methods for managing contacts in a database.
Contacts
 
Country
This class represents a country in the database.
CountryDB
This class provides methods for retrieving and managing countries in a database.
Customer
This class represents a customer.
CustomerDB
This class provides methods for retrieving and managing customer data in a database.
DBConnection
This class is used to establish a connection to the database.
FirstLevelDivision
This class is used to create FirstLevelDivision objects.
FirstLevelDivisionDB
This class provides methods for retrieving and managing first level division data in a database.
LoginController
Controller class that provides control logic for the login form of the application.
Main
This is the main class for the application.
MainController
This class is the controller for the main screen.
ModCustomerController
This class is the controller for the modify customer screen.
MonthlyReport
This class is used to create MonthlyReport objects.
ReportDB
This class provides methods for retrieving and managing report data related to countries and their corresponding appointment counts in a database.
Reports
This class is used to create a report for the number of appointments by type and month.
ReportsController
Class and methods to display 3 reports.
ReportType
This class is used to create ReportType objects.
UpdateAppointmentController
Controller class for the UpdateAppointment screen.
User
This class represents a user in the application.
UserDB
This class provides methods for retrieving and managing user data in a database.
ViewCustomersController
This class is the controller for the View Customer view.
